data.name: London
introduction: London is the capital city of England.
It is the most populous city in the United Kingdom, with a metropolitan area of over 13 million inhabitants.

data.name: Paris
introduction: Paris is the capital and most populous city of France.

data.name: Tokyo
introduction: Tokyo is the capital of Japan, the center of the Greater Tokyo Area.

data.name: Shanghai
introduction: Shanghai is one of the biggest cities of China, the center of the Changsanjiao Economy Area,and the most populous metropolitan area in the world.
